name: TheOrangePuppet
0:
”Alexa, tell The Orange Puppet to lie to me”
”Alexa, ask The Orange Puppet for something completely believable”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the orange puppet
des:
A wonderful, new, skill for Alexa that will give you your daily dose (or multiple doses) of one of the many truthful statements made by Mr. Trump.

The list will be updated frequently... needless to say there will be much to add while he's in office.

This skill is not officially sponsored, or endorsed, by Donald Trump or his campaign.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
